projectDescription.title: Genome-wide p38 RNAi screen
projectDescription.process: activation or inhibition of P38 MAPK signaling by knock-down of endogenously expressed genes/proteins - whole genome
projectDescription.effect: luciferase reporter gene assay reflecting the activation state of the P38 MAPK signaling

application.abstract: A Genome-wide RNAi screen to identify modulators of human P38 signalling using a human siRNA library containing 21.000 different siRNA pools
